name: Alchemist's Accomplice
description:
Alchemist's AccompliceLewis and his alchemist companion headed off in search of treasure, though they may have gotten more than they bargained for. In the darkened forests of the old world, nefarious plots emerged. Forge new alliances and pick your friends in a choose your own adventure from a fantasy realm.Features
  • 2.5D Graphics
  • Bright Fantasy World
  • Multiple Endings
  • 2 Unique Characters to Romance
